title: A job for a student volunteer at the library

content.question: You will participate in simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. You will have a conversation with your friend Chen Linli, director of the public library, about a job for a student volunteer at the library. Response 1

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
